doc:
Debra Paget https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Debra_Paget 0 Debra Paget (born Debralee Griffin; August 19, 1933) is an American actress and entertainer. She is perhaps best known for her performances in Cecil B. DeMille's epic The Ten Commandments (1956) and in Love Me Tender (1956) (the film debut of Elvis Presley), and for the risque (for the time) snake dance scene in The Indian Tomb (1959). Debra_Paget ( born Debralee_Griffin ; August_19_,_1933 ) is an_American_actress_and_entertainer . She is_perhaps_best_known for her_performances in Cecil_B._DeMille 's_epic The_Ten_Commandments ( 1956_) and in Love_Me_Tender_(_1956_) ( the_film_debut of Elvis_Presley_) , and for the_risque_( for the_time )_snake_dance_scene in The_Indian_Tomb_(_1959_) .
